alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Jessamine (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 05 at 2:32PM EDT until September 05 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of EAST CENTRAL Kentucky, including the following counties, Fayette and Jessamine. * WHEN...Until 545 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 232 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Lexington, Nicholasville, Chevy Chase, Veterans Park, U K Arboretum, Fayette Mall, Cadentown, Northland, Cardinal Hill and Meadowthorpe. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
